channel.title: sweden on Gladio Free Europe
channel.description: Recent content in sweden on Gladio Free Europe

item.title: Queen Christina and the Swedish Empire ft. Anton
item.description: Matt Christman gives us the lay of the land in Central Europe in the period of the 30 Years’ War through reference to the 1971 film <!-- raw HTML omitted -->The Last Valley<!-- raw HTML omitted -->.

item.title: Legendary Ancestry Claims
item.description: We examine how medieval and early modern European nobility imagined their families’ ancestors, the origins of such thinking, and how early nationalist movements came to think along similar lines.

item.title: Failed Colonial Ventures of the Americas
item.description: The New World gave birth to many colonies we know and love today, but it also birthed some colonies that didnâ€™t quite make it
